featured.text: In order to know exactly how zebrafish retina is regenerated, the team looked at the neurotransmitter gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA), a chemical messenger in the brain that reduces the activity of neurons.

definition.zh_def: 氨基丁酸的，指含有氨基和丁酸的化合物。
definition.en_def: Relating to or containing aminobutyric acid, a compound that is an amino acid derivative.
definition.example: Aminobutyric acid plays a role in neurotransmission in the brain.
